8507.name: Silas Standard's Farm
description: You are now upon the property of Silas Standard.
Nothing much here but fields and fields of grain
Kind of boring actually

8427.name: Rutherdim Road
description: As you walk further down the street you are greeted with the jovial
sounds of a group of children playing "Knights and Villains." For a
minute you are taken back to your childhood but soon get back on your
way to find your final destination. Whatever that maybe.

8559.name: A relaxing Sauna
description: Wall to wall Cherrywood, there are numerous benches and steamers among
the room.  The heat here feels like enough to melt flesh, but yet holds a
relaxing ambiance.  A slight music plays in the atmosphere and other
occupants converse about travels past.

8528.name: Short Hallway
description: You stand in the middle of the short hallway.
A few framed paintings are scattered on the wall.
Giving the place a little charm.
<--- Room 3  The Old Skull Inn  Room 4 --->

8474.name: {RUNUSED{x
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unessecary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8434.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unnecessary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8460.name: Mother Tara's Feasthall
description: Even though today the feasthall is quite today.
It is legend on how this place can turn into a animal house
in seconds. You smell various types of food roasting
in Mother Tara's ovens ready for the feast tonight..

8492.name: Basilisk Pit
description: As you fall from the ground you suddenly hit damp dirt.
A pair of green eyes start to look at you paralyzing
you with fear.

8464.name: Gateway to the Twisted Tower
description: You stand at the gateway to the Twisted Tower. Two Guards
are here circling the tower in patrols every hour. You ask the
to open the gate and give him the necessary papers to go in.
For some reason you dont think he's to happy with letting you in.

8431.name: Rutherdim Road
description: As you walk further down the street you are greeted with the jovial
sounds of a group of children playing "Knights and Villains." For a
minute you are taken back to your childhood but soon get back on your
way to find your final destination. Whatever that maybe.

8509.name: Temple of Tymora
description: In the temple of the goddess of luck you feel
as if you could do anything you want and win.
A shiny disk of silver is twirling on the altar as
if by magic. You say thanks to Tymora for all
luck she has brought you and go on your way.

8538.name: Island of Mystra's Dance
description: As you land upon Mystra's dance you kiss
the earth as you are glad to get off of the
ocean. You see miles of palm trees waving in
the winds and beautiful shells adorning the beach
in a necklace of magic design. A saurial priestess
is here casting her spells for Mystra and
most of all a huge marut is here preparing to
go to the Fugue plains....

8523.name: Well Lit Hallway
description: Inside Elminster's tower you stand in a well lit
hallway. Glowing balls of mage-light float on air as
roman candles flicker in the draft. You find it....
peaceful.

8423.name: Traven Street
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.
There really isnt that much on this street except
a few people walking around. You probably wont
find anything of interest.

8517.name: Library
description: In this room are books stacked up everywhere you
go. From A to Z you see authors and writings from
all over Toril. Illuminated Texts from the temple of
Tymora, a Shou manuscript that has the lines of a Opera.
You are amazed at how well read Mourngrym is.

8500.name: Druid's Grove
description: A lush and thriving grove of trees are here covering you
with their shadows. In the middle of the grove is a circle
ready to be used for the followers of nature. You take
another look at the beautiful landscape and silently
walk out as not to disturb the wildlife.

8453.name: West Hanazi Way
description: As you go west you notice how nice the roads have become.
Nothing like the pothole-gutted ground of Rutherdim road.
Actually to the south of you the road turns into a beautiful.
marble walkway leading to the Twisted Tower. Two Guards
are here circling the tower in regular rounds.
You heard from a source that Mourngrym is in today
Maybe you should pay him a visit.

8451.name: Galen Road
description: As you stray from East Hanazi Way you start to walk on a
flimsier and whimsical path. In fact you are going a little farther
away from the city to it's many farms and fields.

8483.name: Maze to Elminster's Tower
description: You follow a path to what you hope is Elminster's Tower.
Hedges as large as a giant deny you sight of anything
beyond the path you are walking. You only hope that
you dont fall to one of Elminster's legendary traps of
monsters and voids.

8435.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unnecessary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8462.name: Stables
description: As you enter the stables you gag at the smell of
horse and various other pack animal's dung.
You look at the horse keeper and suddenly see a flash
behind his back.. You push him to the side and suddenly
find a nest of Shou dragon egg that were smuggled from the Shou seas!

8534.name: Inn Room
description: Not a large room, but not a small one.
This room fits your needs perfectly.
You have everything you need. A bed,
a desk, and a closet. You like it.

8479.name: Maze to Elminster's Tower
description: You follow a path to what you hope is Elminster's Tower.
Hedges as large as a giant deny you sight of anything
beyond the path you are walking. You only hope that
you dont fall to one of Elminster's legendary traps of
monsters and voids.

8467.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unessecary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8428.name: Rutherdim Road
description: You are still walking on a long cobblestone road extending far to the north.
As you look east and west you are shocked to see miles of land destroyed by war.
You mouth a prayer to your immortal and quickly go on your way.

8489.name: Dragon's Lair
description: As you enter a dark labyrinth of a cave you
smell the smoke of recently charred meat.
You suddenly come to realiza that you are
in a {@DRAGON'S PIT!{0

8458.name: Smithy
description: As you enter the smithy you instantly start to sweat
from the heat escaping out of the fires. Strong smells
of melting metals ready to be made into weapons or
useful farming implements start to make you nautious
and you ready your things to leave before you throw up.

8408.name: Traven Street
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.
There really isnt that much on this street except
a few people walking around. You probably wont
find anything of interest.

8549.name: Temple's Aids Room
description: This small room is very light decorated and sparcely furnished.
Built by an ancient highpriest, Epsilon, he has dedicated this
room to his goddess and to the teaching and to the aid of others
as the church's dogmatic laws dictates.

8532.name: Inn Room
description: Not a large room, but not a small one.
This room fits your needs perfectly.
You have everything you need. A bed,
a desk, and a closet. You like it.

8535.name: Inn Room
description: Not a large room, but not a small one.
This room fits your needs perfectly.
You have everything you need. A bed,
a desk, and a closet. You like it.

8476.name: Maze to Elminster's Tower
description: You follow a path to what you hope is Elminster's Tower.
Hedges as large as a giant deny you sight of anything
beyond the path you are walking. You only hope that
you dont fall to one of Elminster's legendary traps of
monsters and voids.

8545.name: Hall of Gentle Heart
description: As you enter the Hall of Gentle Heart you suddenly
feel a great compassion toward your fellow man. You
wish to help them as much as they have probably helped
you. You begin to wonder why you have taken so much yet
have not given back. You begin to wonder why your wondering
this.

8459.name: Well
description: One of the favorite spots for gossip people all over
Shadowdale come here to talk about something or the other.
You see many a man and women carrying heavy buckets of
water from a well in the middle of the room.

8413.name: Signei Street
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.
There really isnt that much on this street except
a few people walking around. You probably wont
find anything of interest.

8407.name: Traven Street
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.
There really isnt that much on this street except
a few people walking around. You probably wont
find anything of interest.

8519.name: Gallery
description: As you enter Mourngyrm's Gallery you are awestruck
at the beauty of the paintings he has ammassed over
the years. Some of this artwork is so old that you dont
want to touch it in fear of it crumbling beneath your hands.

8490.name: Maze to Elminster's Tower
description: You follow a path to what you hope is Elminster's Tower.
Hedges as large as a giant deny you sight of anything
beyond the path you are walking. You only hope that
you dont fall to one of Elminster's legendary traps of
monsters and voids.

8510.name: Field
description: A large field stands before you with weeds stretching
their stalks upon the throat of all the plant-life.
Rabbits, horses, wolves, and basilisks and a list of others
live here being hunted or the hunter. Everything seems so balanced.
You start to roll on the floor laughing as a rabbit whaps a fox
with its back feet.

8540.name: Bathing Pools
description: As you go north from Mystra's main hall you suddenly
hit a large hall for bathing. You see a lake-sized
pool with a great waterfall trickling off of the floors.
A servant is here with a bowl of fruit serving you food and
drink. You feel like you are the lord of Waterdeep....

8486.name: Maze to Elminster's Tower
description: You follow a path to what you hope is Elminster's Tower.
Hedges as large as a giant deny you sight of anything
beyond the path you are walking. You only hope that
you dont fall to one of Elminster's legendary traps of
monsters and voids.

8485.name: Entrance to Elminster's Tower
description: As you gasp for breath as you escape the maze
you finally realize that you have gotten to Elminster's
Tower! Swirling auras of blue and white usurp the entrance
in a living tapestry of art. You almost want to touch it.
Instead you take the door knocker and rap hard.

8526.name: Elminster's Bedroom
description: As you walk into Elminster's bedroom you feel
a instant urge to leave. In fact your whole head
begins to pound with the message to leave. It gets
so bad that you run out of the room as fast as you can.

8425.name: Rutherdim Road
description: As you walk further down the street you are greeted with the jovial
sounds of a group of children playing "Knights and Villains." For a
minute you are taken back to your childhood but soon get back on your
way to find your final destination. Whatever that maybe.

8455.name: West Hanazi Way
description: As you go east you notice how nice the roads are pathed here.
Nothing like the pothole-gutted ground of Rutherdim road.
You hear a generous amount of laughter and shouting coming
from the vicinity of Mother Tara's Feasthall. A servent girl is heading
north with a bucket for water.

8491.name: Hakeashir's Lair
description: You have entered the lair of the Hakeashir. Bane of
all wizards. Have fun.

8416.name: Signei Street
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.
There really isnt that much on this street except
a few people walking around. You probably wont
find anything of interest.

8555.name: The All Center
description: There is nothing in the known realms more...  Vast than this room.
The raw infinite reach of space seems to explode in all directions.
There is no visible floor, however, there is a deep {Bblue carpet{7 and an
{*Ebony Throne {7in the near reach.  A path seems to be marked by
flickering, mystical pale blue flames.  What would happen if one were
to walk off the marked path....?  Would you dare find out?

8518.name: Hallway
description: This room is much like all the other rooms of the
tower. Extravagant. Its getting kind of boring now..

8550.name: Nothingness
description: You see nothing.

8430.name: Rutherdim Road
description: As you walk further down the street you are greeted with the jovial
sounds of a group of children playing "Knights and Villains." For a
minute you are taken back to your childhood but soon get back on your
way to find your final destination. Whatever that maybe.

8440.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unnecessary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8547.name: Palace of Torm the True
description: Not exactly the most decadent palace, you can see
that Torm likes things to be simple. In the middle of
palace a grand golden throne fills up most of the room
as loyal followers aid their lord in daily jobs. A few
tapestries hang upon the walls, but nothing much.

8449.name: Old Skull Inn
description: A large tavern is here supporting the main entertainment
of Shadowdale. Many a famous bard have come here
to play there instruments and sing tales of old. A kind
looking bartender maintains a respectable amount of order
You look at the comfortable-looking seats and decide to try
out a nice flask of Waterdeepian wine.
You see a staircase to a few rooms in which you may
spend the night so that you may be comfortable the next
day.

8502.name: Jhaele Silvemane's Farm
description: You are now upon the property of Jhaele Silvermane's Farm.
Not much here but fields and fields of fruits.
Kind of boring actually.

8404.name: Rutherdim Road
description: As you walk further down the street you are greeted with the jovial
sounds of a group of children playing "Knights and Villains." For a
minute you are taken back to your childhood but soon get back on your
way to find your final destination. Whatever that maybe.

8552.name: {6Th{6e {6Im{&m{7or{&t{6al St{&a{7b{&l{6es{0
description: A place where only a deity may go this huge stable is magnificent in
beauty and architecture.  Incredibly large, carved rowen gates magically
hold the immortal mounts, as they buck and ninny.  Truly amazing..  Maybe
the last miracle you will ever see....

8444.name: East Hanazi Way
description: As you go east you notice how nice the roads are pathed here.
Nothing like the pothole-gutted ground of Rutherdim road.
Well you have pretty muched seen every shop on East Hanazi Way
Maybe you should take a look at West Hanazi Way. Always
a new adventure there.

8511.name: Field
description: A large field stands before you with weeds stretching
their stalks upon the throat of all the plant-life.
Rabbits, horses, wolves, and basilisks and a list of others
live here being hunted or the hunter. Everything seems so balanced.
You start to roll on the floor laughing as a rabbit whaps a fox
with its back feet.

8447.name: Latha Brannon's Boarding House
description: Walking around Latha Brannon's Boarding House you
notice one thing that all the children are well-behaved.
From the looks of things Ms. Brannon is very strict on
how things are kept in her house. Well-kept children
are playing with each other while another group are reading.
You sift through you wallets and spare a platinum for
Latha Brannon's cause.

8454.name: West Hanazi Way
description: As you go west you notice how nice the roads have become.
Nothing like the pothole-gutted ground of Rutherdim road.
Smells of clay and horse mingle here filling your nose with
a certain quesiness. You have the sudden urge to move forward.

8405.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unnecessary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8513.name: Throne Room
description: Gold. Thats almost all you see. In fact its almost blinding
you. A large gold throne lays upon a golden carpet
with golden statues surrounding it. You cant supress a
smile at the thought of how bad a lure this is for any
thief.

8501.name: Storm Silverhand's Farm
description: You stand upon the property of Storm Silverhand.
Not much here but fields and fields of vegatables.
Kind of boring actually.

8505.name: Shrine to Tempus
description: The beats of war drums boom in your ears frightening
and sending a chill down your back at the same time
A symbol of a silver sword covered with a bloody field
emblazons itself in your mind forever teaching you the
way of war.

8533.name: Inn Room
description: Not a large room, but not a small one.
This room fits your needs perfectly.
You have everything you need. A bed,
a desk, and a closet. You like it.

8401.name: Rutherdim Road
description: You are still walking on a long cobblestone road extending far to the
north.  As you look east and west you are shocked to see miles of land
destroyed by war.  You mouth a prayer to your immortal and quickly go on
your way.

8504.name: Taraq Drive
description: As you walk upon the dirt paths of Taraq drive you see a glimmering
shrine to the west of you.  Auras of blue and white swirl and combine
within the air here.  The faint sounds of war drums can be heard
beating to the east.

8403.name: Intersection: Rutherdim and Hanazi
description: You stand on the intersection between Rutherdim Road and Hanazi Way.
To the east and west of you is the famous Hanazi Way. You see little
stores and shops decorate the way with sweet aromas and welcoming faces.
A small castle is to the west of you.

8457.name: Stone House
description: You stand inside a large storage room. Grains and
anything that can be preserved are stacked up to the
ceiling waiting to be used in case of a hard winter.

8446.name: Hammerhand's Woodworking
description: As you enter Hammerhand's workshop you start to cough
violently from the woodchips flying in the air.
In front of you, Hammerhand is working on a piece of
wood that might be the beginning of a wagon wheel.

8473.name: {RUNUSED{x
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unessecary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8409.name: Intersection of Traven and Okmar
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.
There really isnt that much on this street except
a few people walking around. You probably wont
find anything of interest. Okmar road is to the north.

8400.name: Pathway to the Shire of Shadowdale
description: A small dirt path is here leading you to the north.  In the distance you
see the village of Shadowdale.

8525.name: Magical Lab
description: As you enter Elminster's lab you hear potions
boiling and evaporating. All around the room
are notebooks filled with formulae and lab
equipment. You feel so small at how large some of
this stuff is. As you walk out the door you sneak
a restorative in your pocket.

8469.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unessecary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8421.name: Traven Street
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.
There really isnt that much on this street except
a few people walking around. You probably wont
find anything of interest. Arok road is to the north.

8488.name: Maze to Elminster's Tower
description: You follow a path to what you hope is Elminster's Tower.
Hedges as large as a giant deny you sight of anything
beyond the path you are walking. You only hope that
you dont fall to one of Elminster's legendary traps of
monsters and voids.

8433.name: Ridge Overlooking A Magnificent Tower
description: The path ends here at the edge of a ridge overlooking a shallow
valley drop.  A dark haze bellows in the shallow valley below, as if
shrouding some great secret.  Jutting from the haze is a magnificent
spiraling tower of white iridescence.  A precarious drop downward
leads into the haze, though it seems to be the only way of reaching
that tower...

8443.name: East Hanazi Way
description: As you go east you notice how nice the roads are pathed here.
Nothing like the pothole-gutted ground of Rutherdim road.
You are assaulted with pleasant aromas and welcoming faces.
Each one urging you into his or her shop to try out there wares or eat.
To the north of you is Hammerhand's Wagonmaking and Woodworking.
To the south Galen Road

8402.name: Rutherdim Road
description: You are walking on a long cobblestone road extending far to the north.
You see various types of people looking at you but nothing exciting.
A few dwarves are arguing about something on the other side of the
road but it doesnt seem that bad.

8419.name: Arok Road
description: As you walk up Arok Road you notice how scarce
everything is here. A few people are here talking
about old times but nothing much. This would be perfect
realty. You wonder why people dont grab it up.

8515.name: Royal Dining Room
description: As you walk into this immense dining hall you gaze
upon a great rectangular oak table. A maze of beautiful
engravings seems to dance around the trim of the table.
On top of the table are four lighted candles set equally
across from each other. At the end of the table sits
a grand chair that is probably meant for Mourngrym
considering that a painting of the lord himself is behind it.

8521.name: Meeting Room
description: As you walk away from the hallway you enter
a meeting room. You see several chairs facing each
other awaiting for someone to sit on them to make
conversation. You take a seat and await audience
with Elminster.

8414.name: Signei Street
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.
There really isnt that much on this street except
a few people walking around. You probably wont
find anything of interest.

8496.name: Galen Road
description: As you stray from East Hanazi Way you start to walk on a
flimsier and whimsical path. In fact you are going a little farther
away from the city to it's many farms and fields.

8498.name: Temple to Lathander
description: In the temple of the Morninglord you find yourself reborn.
A simple disk a rose, pink hue decorates everything here.
A painting of mist of glowing rose-colored swirls graces
the hands of a Lathanderite placing it on a nearby wall.

8539.name: Hall of Magicks
description: A great blue and white marble hall is here
containing millions and millions of magical creatures
here ready to warn or disapprove of something.
You are held amazed at how complex this place is.

8530.name: Inn Room
description: Not a large room, but not a small one.
This room fits your needs perfectly.
You have everything you need. A bed,
a desk, and a closet. You like it.

8463.name: Pet dummy room
description: For any who teleport here this is a pet reset room.
Don't charm any mobs etc etc etc. hehe Mystra.

8472.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unessecary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8546.name: Priest's Cells
description: These cells not particurlarly beautiful were
meant for the servants of Mystra. A few paintings
of loved ones lay upon the walls and beds are arranged
in a neat row for those wishing to sleep. Basically
theres no use seeing this room if your not related to
any of Mystra's followers.

8531.name: Inn Room
description: Not a large room, but not a small one.
This room fits your needs perfectly.
You have everything you need. A bed,
a desk, and a closet. You like it.

8436.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unnecessary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8529.name: Short Hallway
description: You are in the end of the hallway. A large window
is here gazing out into East Hanazi Way. You see
a few children horsing around and start to grin.
<--- Room 5  The Old Skull Inn  Room 6 --->

8475.name: Begining of a Maze
description: You are at the beginnings of a long perilous maze
of hedges and trees. Only those most known to
Elminster know the way through it. Be cautious hundreds
of a traps are around the corners produced by Elminster himself.
A huge portal is here admitting only the heroes of the land.

8560.name: A Pool-Side Bar
description: Various colored {-l{-i{-g{-h{-t{-s{7 spot the room and ocaissionally beam
out to the sky as you step toward a more relaxed area in the poolhouse{x.
Though there is no bartender at the moment, prepared drinks are in abundance
on each of the tables.  There are a few tables here basking in gentle
Candlelight.

8412.name: Signei Street
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.
There really isnt that much on this street except
a few people walking around. You probably wont
find anything of interest. Okmar Road is to the south.

8406.name: Intersection: Rutherdim and Traven
description: You have come upon the intersections of Rutherdim Road and Traven Street.
You see that the road has been gradually turned from cobblestone to brick
making it seem like a patchwork quilt of potholes. You are greeted
with the jovial sounds of a group of children playing "Knights
and Villains." For a minute you are taken back to your
childhood but soon get back on your way to find your
final destination. Whatever that maybe.

8452.name: Galen Road
description: As you stray from East Hanazi Way you start to walk on a
flimsier and whimsical path. In fact you are going a little farther
away from the city to it's many farms and fields.

8508.name: Field
description: A large field stands before you with weeds stretching
their stalks upon the throat of all the plant-life.
Rabbits, horses, wolves, and basilisks and a list of others
live here being hunted or the hunter. Everything seems so balanced.
You start to roll on the floor laughing as a rabbit whaps a fox
with its back feet.

8418.name: Signei Street
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.
There really isnt that much on this street except
a few people walking around. You probably wont
find anything of interest. Arok Road is to the south.

8522.name: Assistant's Room
description: After waiting for 3 hours for the great sage you
get impatiant and start to look around the tower.
You enter an assistant's room and assume that
it could only be Lhaeo's. A few manuscripts of magic
clutter the floor and a bed covered with more. It
doesnt look to be slept in.

8470.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unessecary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8541.name: Church's Kitchen
description: Entering the church's kitchen you are bombarded
with delicious smells of food and appetizing snacks
ready to be served at Epsilon Moonshade's Festhall.
A large table fills the room for those who are to poor
to find food anywhere else. A kindly chef is here smiling
at you as if you were one of the poor and weary that travel
here throughout the day. If they only knew.

8468.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unessecary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8411.name: Okmar Road
description: As you walk up Okmar Road you notice how scarce
everything is here. A few people are here talking
about old times but nothing much. This would be perfect
realty. You wonder why people dont grab it up.

8471.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unessecary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8495.name: Galen Road
description: As you stray from East Hanazi Way you start to walk on a
flimsier and whimsical path. In fact you are going a little farther
away from the city to it's many farms and fields.
To the south of you is the even smaller path of Taraq Drive

8456.name: West Hanazi Way
description: As you go west you notice how nice the roads are pathed here
Nothing like the pothole-gutted ground of Rutherdim road.
To the south of you is the Smithy. The banging sounds of metal
vibrate through out the room with hums. To the north of you is the Stone House
You still marvel at how nice these roads are kept.

8556.name: The {^Fe{&ast{^ha{&ll {BUpon the {&M{3oo{&n{x
description: This large festhall seems to be..  Well..  It seems to be located on the
moon, Selune, itself...  Made of crystal blocks that seem to be connected by
the power of weave-granted magic, this hall is coveted by a large cherrywood
table that sits hundreds.  At the backside of the hall connects a burning
fireplace that heats this room from the coldness of space.  In the middle of
the table is a hollowed out circle that contains a small fountains of a blue
icy liquid that you presume will cool your throat as soon as your drink the
magnificent stuff.

8514.name: Kitchen
description: As you enter the kitchen you hit your knee on
a large oven that you seem to have missed.
Actually you see a row of ovens all ready to be
used for entertaining any of Mourngrym's guest.
You feel a grumble in your stomach and hope that
you can manage not to eat before your next meal.

8426.name: Rutherdim Road
description: As you walk further down the street you are greeted with the jovial
sounds of a group of children playing "Knights and Villains." For a
minute you are taken back to your childhood but soon get back on your
way to find your final destination. Whatever that maybe.
To the east of you, you see a entrance to a large hedge maze.
Appearing far in the distance is a tower glowing with the auras of blue and white.

8445.name: Okmar Road
description: The road known as Okmar begins here and runs north.  A damp fog
covers the road with glistening dew and they in turn form small
puddles that swirl and glisten on their own.  East Hanazi starts to
the south of here.  Just off the road to the east is a makeshift tent,
a table and several items strewn about.

8439.name: Trinket Booth
description: This small booth seems the most unlikely place to set up a trinket
shop, yet here one seems to have been set up.  A tall human wearing a
long tunic stands behind his booth, peddling trinkets of all manner.
He doesn't seem the vendor type, with long hair and moderately thick
leather armor, and a longsword fitted to his hip.  Indeed this setup
looks only to be temporary.

8422.name: Traven Street
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.
There really isnt that much on this street except
a few people walking around. You probably wont
find anything of interest.

8487.name: Maze to Elminster's Tower
description: You follow a path to what you hope is Elminster's Tower.
Hedges as large as a giant deny you sight of anything
beyond the path you are walking. You only hope that
you dont fall to one of Elminster's legendary traps of
monsters and voids.

8520.name: Bedroom
description: Interesting. This room unlike all the others is plain.
A regular bed with regular sheets covets most of
the room. A few sparce drawings and paintings take
the wall. Two bedstands besides both sides of the beds.
Not really a room for a king but you guess that Mourngrym
was getting bored with the fanciful rooms.

8477.name: Maze to Elminster's Tower
description: You follow a path to what you hope is Elminster's Tower.
Hedges as large as a giant deny you sight of anything
beyond the path you are walking. You only hope that
you dont fall to one of Elminster's legendary traps of
monsters and voids.

8537.name: Mystra's Feast Hall
description: Inside Mystra's Hall you notice how beautiful it
was built. Beautiful auras of magic hangs in the air
with Siew making beautiful designs in it. A bard is in
the corner singing, "The Tears of Selune", here and
a few of Mystra's followers are here dancing happily
as they take a break from their studies of the weave.

8478.name: Maze to Elminster's Tower
description: You follow a path to what you hope is Elminster's Tower.
Hedges as large as a giant deny you sight of anything
beyond the path you are walking. You only hope that
you dont fall to one of Elminster's legendary traps of
monsters and voids.

8543.name: Hall of True Mystery
description: One of the more popular rooms of the church it is held
as one of the greater mysteries of all of Faerun. You walk
around the room as the tiles of the floor constantly change
from blue to white and the walls seem to be in constant movement
An illusion of Mystra revolves upon a pedastal as she dances
a strange and exotic dance. The very air here is dark as the
mist of the Island of Mystra's dance engulfs to room. As
you wander around the grand room you start to hear strange music
and begin to dance to it unconsciously. Suddenly your surrounded
by others who are enthralled by the music. You begin dancing in a
frenzy until you drop in exhaustion and rest.

8512.name: Lord Mourngrym's Hall
description: Grand paintings and statues of old decorate this
hall in perfect arrangement. Several magelight lamps are
posted around the walls lighting the hall up with
glorious colors. This hall is so large that it takes
several maids to clean it up which you see they are
doing right now. Shou Rugs and music from the south
of Toril give the room a certain jovial feeling. You almost
want to dance.

8415.name: Intersection: Rutherdim and Signei
description: You have come upon the intersections of Rutherdim Road and Segnei Street.
Small caravans and portable shops are parked here announcing there wares.
As you walk further down the street you are greeted with the jovial
sounds of a group of children playing "Knights and Villains." For a
minute you are taken back to your childhood but soon get back on your
way to find your final destination. Whatever that maybe.

8480.name: Beholder's Lair
description: You have entered a dark, dank lair. From the darkness
several eyes start to stare at you. You feel death approaching.

8499.name: Temple of Chauntea
description: As you enter the temple of Chauntea you are held
back by how much grain there is as sacrifice to Chauntea.
A statue of a sheaf of golden wheat hangs on the wall
behind a altar while a budding flower inside a sunburst
decorates the altar.

8437.name: Signei Street
description: Signei Street runs east and west here.  The air is cool and there
is barely a noise to be heard.  It is a quiet hamlet, almost too
quiet.

8557.name: Master Bedroom
description: The luxurious room is draped from the ceiling in multicolored
silks, covering and obscuring everything in the room.  Almost like a
maze of silks, to play in.  There is a bed, in the near middle, which
acts as a helix, for the coloured silks.  The other furniture of the
room, and dimensions, lay inconceivable to the mind.

8551.name: {2The G{3r{1ov{3e{2s of T{3i{1r {2N{1a {2O{3g{0
description: As you enter the groves of Silvanus in the outlands you find your suddenly
surrounded by thousands upon millions of woodland creatures, mythical and ones
that you have seen all the time. Large halls of interwoven wood still in it's
ground make a huge palace. So very.. very.. woodsy.

8466.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unessecary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8548.name: House of Knowledge in Tir Na Og
description: This magnificent palace is what appears to be a even more
magnificent library.. Filled with every book made in the realms, this
palacial library dwarves even the greatest of the ancient libraries.
In the center of this paradise to sages and scholar lays a great and
magnificent pool that seems to be resting place of Oghma the Wise..

8448.name: Hut of Hoareb Nimblefingers
description: A pleasant, short, middle-aged woman, Hoareb serves as
midwife, surgeon, and healer of both man and beast in the dale.
She has the healing proficiency, backed up by those healing magics
and potions as are made available by Lord Mourngrym.
Though the increasing number of churches has made priests and
and their healing magics more plentiful, most of the people of
shadowdale trust Hoareb's steady hand and practiced eye.

8441.name: East Hanazi Way
description: As you go east you notice how nice the roads are pathed here.
Nothing like the pothole-gutted ground of Rutherdim road.
You are assaulted with pleasant aromas and welcoming faces.
Each one urging you into his or her shop to try out there wares or eat.
You see a particularly nice Inn to the south and
the hut of Nimblefingers is to the north. Why not take a look?

8461.name: Meira Lulhannon: Potter's Workshop
description: You almost laugh at the mess this place is in
Clay pots and statues lay around here cluttering
everything. You finally manage to stumble through the mess
and ask for your item.

8503.name: Taraq Drive
description: As you walk from Galen road to Taraq drive you feel
a certain cramming of space. The road has long since changed
into dirt so your boots are collecting small pebbles.
You grumble as they bite into you and go on your way.

8542.name: Pax Treaty Hall
description: This being a room for peace and talk the Church of
Mystra has united many of Waterdeep's clans into talks
of peace and treaty. A beautiful geothermal lake has
been transported here allegedly by Mystra herself
from Mount Celestia herself. A large table filled with
a great variety of foods is here and Hanei the temple
maid is here ready to provide you with anything you need.

8482.name: Maze to Elminster's Tower
description: You follow a path to what you hope is Elminster's Tower
Hedges as large as a giant deny you sight of anything
beyond the path you are walking. You only hope that
you dont fall to one of Elminster's legendary traps of monsters
and voids.

8417.name: Signei Street
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.
There really isnt that much on this street except
a few people walking around. You probably wont
find anything of interest.

8450.name: Tulba the Weaver's Shop
description: Upon the walls of this fine establishment are various
article of clothes ready to be sold. Fine silk from common
cotton are made by Tulba to serve all classes of people
the rich, middleclass, and the poor.

8481.name: Maze to Elminster's Tower
description: You follow a path to what you hope is Elminster's Tower.
Hedges as large as a giant deny you sight of anything
beyond the path you are walking. You only hope that
you dont fall to one of Elminster's legendary traps of monsters
and voids.

8465.name: Devestated Area of Land
description: This land is desolate. The product of war this land has
been burnt to the ground. You almost cry at the unessecary
demolition of a meticulously thought out war. You
mouth a prayer to your immortal and go on your way.

8516.name: Second Floor
description: Standing on the second floor of the Twisted Tower you
examine the floor and press on.

8424.name: Ridge Overlooking A Magnificent Tower
description: You stand on a short street going east and west.  There really isnt
that much on this street except a few people walking around.  You
probably wont find anything of interest.  A small path diverges from
Rutherdim Road to the east where it leads to an overlook.

8494.name: Galen Road
description: As you stray from East Hanazi Way you start to walk on
flimsier and whimsical path. In fact you are going a little farther
away from the city to it's many farms and fields.

8429.name: Pathway to the Shire of Shadowdale
description: A small dirt path is here leading you to the south.
In the distance you see the village of Shadowdale.

8484.name: Maze to Elminster's Tower
description: You follow a path to what you hope is Elminster's Tower.
Hedges as large as a giant deny you sight of anything
beyond the path you are walking. You only hope that
you dont fall to one of Elminster's legendary traps of
monsters and voids.

8438.name: Traven Street
description: Traven Street runs east and west.  Much of it is grown over,
seeming from neglect, but perhaps it is the citizen's way of getting
closer to nature.  There isn't much of interest here

8506.name: Shrine to Mystra
description: By the gods this shrine is beautiful. Every color that blue
and white can be swirl and writhe here upon the altar,
the walls, and everything! You see priest sacrificing their
magics to the Lady of Mysteries, praising her with all their heart.
You see the symbol of eight stars with red mist everywhere.

8493.name: Galen Road
description: As you stray from East Hanazi Way you start to walk on a
flimsier and whimsical path. In fact you are going a little farther
away from the city to it's many farms and fields.

8536.name: Office
description: You are now standing in a small little office in the back
of the Old Skull Inn's Tavern. A small little man is here
filling out forms for supplies and such. You ring the bell on
ther counter to get his attention only to be pointed at the sign on
wall telling you to type List.

8544.name: Hall of Silent Contemplation
description: The Hall of Silent Contemplation was created so
the followers of Mystra could think and meditate
on the proper uses of spell conduct and spell
manipulation. Several bamboo mats litter the floor
with small pitchers of hot and cold water on each side.
A strange silence permeates throughout the air in a fascinating
way...

8524.name: Second Floor
description: After waiting for 3 hours for the great sage you
get impatiant and start to look around the tower.
As you walk up the stairway to the second floor you
notice a interesting room to the west. The sounds
of potions boiling and evaporating gurgle throughout
the floor.

8497.name: Galen Road
description: As you stray from East Hanazi Way you start to walk on a
flimsier and whimsical path. In fact you are going a little farther
away from the city to it's many farms and fields.
All around you are the temples of Lathander and Chauntea
The legendary immortal lovers.  Lady of Agriculture and
Lord of Rebirth this couple makes a perfect pair.

8410.name: Okmar Road
description: As you walk up Okmar Road you notice how scarce
everything is here. A few people are here talking
about old times but nothing much. This would be perfect
realty. You wonder why people dont grab it up.

8561.name: {!T{@h{#e {BH{%a{^l{7l {!o{@f {#Q{Bu{%e{^s{&t{!s{0
description: A loud voice suddenly blasts at you..  "CONGRATULATIONS young adventurer!
You have succeeded in winning a Quest!  Choose a door and find your Prize!
North: A door made of pure gold and emblazoned on it is a large 1.
West: A door made of mighty oak, emblazoned on it is a large 2.
East: A door made of beautiful jade, emblazoned on it is a large 3.

8442.name: East Hanazi Way
description: As you go east you notice how nice the roads are pathed here.
Nothing like the pothole-gutted ground of Rutherdim road.
You are assaulted with pleasant aromas and welcoming faces.
Each one urging you into his or her shop to try out there wares or eat.
To the north of you is Latha Brannon's Boarding House and to the south
is Tulba the Weaver's Shop. Hmm. Maybe you could use a new pair of pants

8432.name: Rutherdim Road
description: You are still walking on a long cobblestone road extending far to
the north.  As you look east and west you are shocked to see miles of
land destroyed by war.  You mouth a prayer to your immortal and
quickly go on your way.

8420.name: Arok Road
description: As you walk up Arok Road you notice how scarce
everything is here. A few people are here talking
about old times but nothing much. This would be perfect
realty. You wonder why people dont grab it up.

8527.name: Short Hallway
description: As you finished walking up the stairway you arrive in
a small hallway. Not exactly a four-star hotel but it will do.
<--- Room 1  The Old Skull Inn  Room2 --->

8558.name: {&T{^h{&e {^A{6q{bu{BaP{bl{6e{^x{x
description: Great glassed skylines form a fantastic view of the starry sky,
with a tremendous view of the Hal Nebula.  Whisps of ionic clouds
dancs an amorphic dance as the {Rc{^o{@l{%o{#u{&r{Rs{7 change and shift, from
solarizes, to pastels, and back again.  The water itself, lighted and
synthesized to change {Rc{^o{@l{%o{#u{&r{Rs {7also, throws beautiful refractions onto
the walls.
Poolchairs and Tables line the walkways, and gentle motif-effect water
falls through the elaborate aquaduct system, designed for a soothing effect.

8555.name: {*L{5a{^i{5n{*a{x~
subroutines:
F for AHV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
8555.room_name: A beautiful {*Dark {5A{8nge{5l{7 is here, allowing you access....{x

8454.name: Mystra's Marut~
description: A marut is here with a halo of eight stars.
8454.room_name: A marut is here with a halo of eight stars.

8455.name: Hope Incarnate~
description: A bring instilled with the power of Mystra is here.
8455.room_name: The living incarnation of hope is here giving you new hope.

8456.name: A gem dragon~
description: A bring instilled with the power of Mystra is here.
8456.room_name: A beautiful, sparkling, gem dragon is flying here.

8457.name: A white cat~
description: A bring instilled with the power of Mystra is here.
8457.room_name: A white cat with blue and white eyes is here.

8458.name: A blue and clear gemstone~
description: A bring instilled with the power of Mystra is here.
8458.room_name: A blue and clear gemstone is here showing you the way.

8459.name: Courge Incarnate~
description: A being instilled with the power of Mystra is here.
8459.room_name: The living incarnate of courage is here giving you courage to meet a new day.

8460.name: Hanei~
description:
A small servant is here ready to help you
with what you need.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
8460.room_name: Hanei, Servant of Mystery is here.

8461.name: Traena the cook~
8461.room_name: A small cook is here serving food.

8462.name: Servant of Mystery~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
8462.room_name: One of the many servants of mystery are here preparing to go to sleep.

8463.name: {&A stubby little dwarf{0~
8463.room_name: {&A stubby little dwarf is here taking care of the immortal mounts.{0

8464.name: {6S{2ie{6w{0 {&of {3K{1ar{3a-T{1u{3r{0~
description:
This beautiful shou dragon is the empress for the shou dragon
in the easter lands of Kara-Tur.
An extrmely valuable friend of Mystra, they are seen almost
always together.

8465.name: A pu{&r{7e {&v{7irgi{&n {7whi{&t{7e {7pe{&g{7a{&s{7us{0~
description:
A pegasus that belongs to one of many in Sune Firehair's
flocks is neighing for it's next meal. Such a pretty thing..

8466.name: {&A {&s{7h{&i{7n{&y {&chromatic{0 {1H{3a{2r{3d{1y D{3a{2yto{3n{1a{0~
description: This is Nisstyre, the undeads, brand new Hardy Daytona. *Broom* *Broom*
8466.room_name: {&A {&s{7h{&i{7n{&y {&chromatic{0 {1H{3a{2r{3d{1y D{3a{2yto{3n{1a{0 is burning up the track here.

8467.name: {&The {2wo{3l{1fho{3u{2nd of the an{3c{1i{3e{2nt g{3r{1ov{3e{2s{0~
8467.room_name: {&The {2wo{3l{1fho{3u{2nd of the an{3c{1i{3e{2nt g{3r{1ov{3e{2s guards here.{0

8400.name: A gaunt beggar~
description:
As you look at the beggar you feel a knot in
your heart and prepare to give him a silver. As
you reach into your purse you notice that it and the
beggar is gone!!!
8400.room_name: A gaunt beggar is here pleading for your money.

8401.name: A young farmhand~
description: A young farmhand is here helping his employer move some hay to the barn
8401.room_name: A young farmhand is here moving hay.

8402.name: A short healer~
description:
You see a pleasant, middle-aged woman awaiting 
to heal you.
8402.room_name: A small healer awaits here for her next patient.

8403.name: A Priestess of Tymora~
description:
A young, vibrant edition to the temple of Tymora,
this priestess is ready to take care of you.
8403.room_name: A beautiful priestess stands here giving you her luck.

8404.name: A priest of Lathander~
description:
A handsome man is here holding out his hand to give
you a blessing of Lathander.
8404.room_name: A priest of Lathander is here offering you rebirth of soul.

8405.name: A priestess of Chauntea~
description: A yound priestess is here readying a pot for a temple plant.
8405.room_name: A priestess of Chauntea is hear tilling to soil for her mistress.

8406.name: Tulba the Weaver~
description:
A generous woman, Tulba has always been known to
frequently to the charities of several temples.
subroutines:
M speech 8410 enchanted elven silk~
M speech 8409 weave the cloth~
8406.room_name: A small weaver is here paying attention to her counter

8407.name: A clerk~
description:
A small, boney man is here shuffling through some papers.
He looks up at you, grumbles, and ask for what you want.
8407.room_name: A small, bony man is here ruffling through some papers.

8408.name: The Bartender~
description:
Fresh out of school this man is a little clumsy
on the drinks, but has a nice attitude that makes
the room more vibrant.
8408.room_name: A bartender is here passing out all sorts of alcohol

8409.name: a smithy~
description:
A huge smithy is here pounding away at a sword
that he has been working on for weeks.
8409.room_name: A huge smithy is here pounding away at a sword.

8410.name: the SUPER BETTER-THAN YOU DESCIPLE OF NEXUS~
8410.room_name: One of the few and only disciples of Nexus, is here.

8411.name: Meira Lulhannon~
description:
Meira Lulhannon is here ready and willing to sell
her wares
8411.room_name: A pleasant woman is here selling her wares.

8412.name: a horse keeper~
description:
A horse keeper is here ordering a stable boy to scoop
up the dung that has recently been delivered by the
horses around you.
8412.room_name: A horse keeper is here tending to his horses

8413.name: A pony~
description: The small white pony looks like the perfect pack animal.
8413.room_name: A small pony whinnies next to you.

8414.name: a mare~
description: The beautiful black mare looks like the perfect companion.
8414.room_name: A beautiful black mare gallops around the room here.

8415.name: a war stallion~
description: The great war stallion looks like the perfect warrior.
8415.room_name: A great war stallion is here ready to go into battle.

8416.name: A small boy~
description:
The small boy here is playing "Knights and Villains"
with his friends. He ducks below your legs just in the
nick of time to catch his "villain" friend.
8416.room_name: A small boy is here playing around with his friends

8417.name: A small girl~
description:
A small girl is here playing jumping rope. She looks
at the boys surround her and tilts her head in a
haughty silence and skips her rope to another side of the road.
8417.room_name: A small girl is here playing with a jumping rope.

8418.name: A rich woman~
description:
A fine woman of excellent breeding is here bossing
you around as if she owned the place. You almost abandon
her in a dark alley but think of how well a tip she'll give you.
8418.room_name: A woman of fine breeding is here

8419.name: A rich man~
description: A man of good breeding is here kicking you around.
8419.room_name: A man of good breeding is here.

8420.name: A townguard~
description: You see a well-trained guard ready to defend the city.
8420.room_name: A regal looking townguard is here protecting his city.

8421.name: A small basilisk~
description:
Crawling towards you a small lizard-like animal is
trying to entrap you with it's eyes.
8421.room_name: A lizard-like animal is here trying to get you to stare at it.

8422.name: A cat~
description:
This small cat is fluffy and amazingly clean.  It appears to be a
stray but very friendly.  It also looks all skin and bones beneath the
fur.
8422.room_name: A small, calico cat is here meowing to anyone who will listen.

8423.name: A dragon~
description: A silver dragon is here trying to protect her home.
8423.room_name: A large dragon is here ready to eat you.

8424.name: A large dog~
description: A large dog is here trying to get a meal off of you.
8424.room_name: A large dog is here digging in the dirt.

8425.name: A rat~
description: A small, grimy rat is here spreading all types of diseases.
8425.room_name: A small, grimy rat is rummaging through the trash here.

8426.name: Lhaeo, Elminster's assistant~
description:
Lhaeo, Elminster's assistant and trusted friend is
here helping you with your stuff.
8426.room_name: Lhaeo, Elminster's assistant is here catching up on some text.

8427.name: The Town Sentinel~
description:
Spear in hand the town sentinel is ready to die in glory
with his city.
8427.room_name: The town sentinel is here guarding the city with his life.

8428.name: A Priestess of Mystra~
description: A priestess of Mystra is here preparing a spell for the next sermon.
8428.room_name: A priestess of Mystra is here preparing a spell

8429.name: A priest to Tempus~
description: A priest of Tempus is here tempering a sword for mock battle.
8429.room_name: A priest of Tempus is here tempering a sword.

8430.name: A Street Vendor~
description: A street vendor is here selling her foods.
8430.room_name: A street vendor is here selling her foods.

8431.name: The Beholder~
description:
A hideous many eyed mass of flesh glares at
you with tyrannicaly hate and malice.
8431.room_name: A beholder is here ready to kill you with one of it's many eyes.

8432.name: A Hakeashir~
8432.room_name: A hakeashir is here devouring your magic.

8433.name: A long, slender baby Shou dragon~
description:
A beautiful baby Shou dragon is here willing to be your loyal pet.
You start to laugh as he burps up a smoke cloud.
8433.room_name: A long, slender baby Shou dragon stretches her wings here
8433.keywords: A long, slender baby Shou dragon~

8434.name: Siew the Shou Dragon~
description:
A Shou dragon is here flying in the air as her body
twirls like a beautiful green ribbon. As she comes to
ask who you are you see the symbol of Mystra imprinted
in her chest. What a magnificant creature...
subroutines:
F aff T
F vul FI
8434.room_name: Siew is here readying herself for flight.

8435.name: Jonnas Draves~
description:
He is a human of tall stature, muscular with long blond hair that
he keeps loosely bound with twine.  He wears strapped leather armor
and carries with him a longsword tied at the hip.  On his back is
strung a leather backpack.  He has several items strewn about for sale
here, and seems all too eager to make a deal.  He has the look of an
adventurer, yet he is a peddler of cheap trinkets.
8435.room_name: Jonnas the trinket seller stands behind his makeshift booth.

8447.name: A saurial priestess~
description:
As you land upon the lands of Mystra's dance
you see a ancient saurial... As you watch her
praying you see her glow a bright blue and white
and then suddenly start to levitate and fly!
8447.room_name: A saurial priestess is here readying herself for starflight.
